PRJ_ID = COALESCE( #prjId# , #selPrjId# ) ) A LEFT JOIN FLW1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID ) LEFT JOIN FLW1100 C ON ( B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND B.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = C.FLOW_ID ) LEFT JOIN ADM2000 D ON ( A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = D.USR_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL /* 신규요청사항 요청이 아닌건만 */ AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.REQ_CLS_ID = #reqClsId# AND (T1.REQ_CLS_ID IS NULL OR T1.REQ_CLS_ID = '') AND UPPER( T1.REQ_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.REQ_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.REQ_USR_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.PROCESS_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.FLOW_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.REQ_NO ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T1.REQ_ORD ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchCd# AND T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE = #searchCd# AND T1.REQ_TYPE_CD = #searchCd# ) T2 ORDER BY T2.REQ_ORD_NUMBER DESC, T2.REQ_DTM DESC, T2.REG_DTM DESC
